raw_text:
MENUS AND DISPLAYS Embraer Legacy 450/500 and Praetor 500/600 Video – Video Source Menu Pro Line Fusion® Avionics

Text Color Location Description

EVS CLR Green Upper left Shows when the EVS video has been cleared on the HUD PDU by the pilot.

EVS INIT Green Upper left Shows during EVS initialization.

EVS FAIL Cyan (ﬂashing) Center (below HUD FAIL) Shows when a failure is detected with the EVS video stream.

EVS TEMP Green Upper left Shows when the EVS video has been removed due to a thermal shutdown.

HUD FAIL Cyan (ﬂashing) Center Shows when a failure is detected with the HUD system.
